actions.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of settlement agreements reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
short_title: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992

summary.text: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of certain settlement agreements reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation as leases.

titles.title: Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation Lease Settlements Act of 1992
A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide for the treatment of settlement agreements reached with the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation.
